alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 12:26AM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations will generally be less than 1 inch early this morning. However, Northwest winds of 20 to 25 mph with gusts of 30 to 35 mph will cause some additional blowing and drifting of the snow early this morning. * WHERE...Phillips County Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will remain very difficult to impossible with numerous road closures across the area. Blowing and drifting snow across roadways will be the primary hazard early this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
